Nightlight::

Nighlight froze when Flicker showed her true identity and her fear 
increased by the fact that her litte and beloved daugther resulted 
harm.

"What can I do???"thought her, she didn't care what will happen to 
her just her baby was more important for her life. She had to do 
something quickly and she thought that it was very necesary 'cause 
Aerotaur appeared... It could do that FLicker harmed her baby or 
with the fight, Elita resulted harmed.

"It's nothing, Aerotaur"said Nightlight with a tembled voice "We... 
aren't harm... Accidents happen"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        He listens for a moment and ponders.  "Why not?  We could 
give the 
> base a shot just like anyone else."  He thinks a moment longer and 
realizes 
> the flaw in his logic.  "Except the base has no circulatory fluids 
to carry 
> the vaccine.  Nevermind me I'm going for a walk.  Kup, sir, I'll 
be around if 
> and when I'm needed."  He leaves the now crowded commanders office 
and 
> wanders through the base again.  He turns around one corner and 
nearly runs 
> into Flicker and Nightlight.  He recoils startled.  "Terribly 
sorry sir, 
> ma'am."  He nods his head in apology.
